[^Effect][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^VictoryPoint] for every 2 core resources spent
Items.Flavor: I can’t believe how inconvenient life must have been before these drone existed

Items.Name: Resurrection Program
Items.Text:
[^Trigger][[WingDings3 u]] [[BoldText Invent]] a different [^Biotech] invention 
[^Effect][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^VictoryPoint] for every 2 core resources spent
Items.Flavor: Solving new ways to bring your loved ones back

Items.Name: Dimensional Fracking
Items.Text:
[^Trigger][[WingDings3 u]] [[BoldText Invent]] a different [^Dimensional] invention 
[^Effect][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^VictoryPoint] for every 2 core resources spent
Items.Flavor: Yes, it's mass murder, but it's not mass murder in this dimension

Items.Name: Dark Matter Stabilizer
Items.Text:
[^Trigger][[WingDings3 u]] [[BoldText Invent]] a different [^DarkMatter] invention 
[^Effect][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^VictoryPoint] for every 2 core resources spent
Items.Flavor: This finally allows us to use Dark Matter everywhere without risks

Items.Name: Iteration Device
Items.Text:
This invention is 1 resource cheaper for each [[BoldText Invent]] invention you have

This is worth 1[^VictoryPoint] for every [[BoldText Invent]] invention you have
Items.Flavor: Inventions are never perfect on your first attempt; It’s all about iterating quickly

Items.Name: Dimensional Streaming
Items.Text:
[^Trigger][[WingDings3 u]] Do an [^Activity] that only gains [^Money]
[^Effect][[WingDings3 u]] Lose 3[^Money] and gain 1[^VictoryPoint] for each [^ChronoMatter] cost on that [^Activity]

[^Overclock] 2[[WingDings3 u]] 1[^Activity] gives you 5[^Money] instead of each [^Science], [^Parts], or [^Energy]
Items.Flavor: Supply the best TV shows accross the multiverse

Items.Name: Omega Vault
Items.Text: This is worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every 2[^ChronoMatter] spent on [^Activity] that only gain [^Money]
Items.Flavor: The Omega Vault holds wealth beyond imagination with a temporal security system

Items.Name: Super Antivirus
Items.Text:
[^Trigger][[WingDings3 u]] Do an [^Activity] that gains [^Science]
[^Effect][[WingDings3 u]] Lose 3[^Money] and gain 1[^VictoryPoint] for each [^ChronoMatter] cost on that [^Activity]

[^Overclock] 1[[WingDings3 u]] 1[^Activity] gives you [^Science] instead of [^Parts] or [^Energy]
Items.Flavor: Bio weapons don’t stand a chance against this new antivirus

Items.Name: Ultimate Scientific Library
Items.Text: This is worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every 2[^ChronoMatter] spent on [^Activity] that gain [^Science]
Items.Flavor: Any invention you come up with has already been recorded in the library

Items.Name: High-Tech Warehouse
Items.Text:
[^Trigger][[WingDings3 u]] Do an [^Activity] that gains [^Parts]
[^Effect][[WingDings3 u]] Lose 3[^Money] and gain 1[^VictoryPoint] for each [^ChronoMatter] cost on that [^Activity]

[^Overclock] 1[[WingDings3 u]] 1[^Activity] gives you [^Parts] instead of [^Science] or [^Energy]
Items.Flavor: Like a library for technology

Items.Name: Reforming Nanites
Items.Text: This is worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every 2[^ChronoMatter] spent on [^Activity] that gain [^Parts]
Items.Flavor: All our parts are repurposable instantly with a bit of code

Items.Name: Energy Scarcity Generator
Items.Text:
[^Trigger][[WingDings3 u]] Do an [^Activity] that gains [^Energy]
[^Effect][[WingDings3 u]] Lose 3[^Money] and gain 1[^VictoryPoint] for each [^ChronoMatter] cost on that [^Activity]

[^Overclock] 1[[WingDings3 u]] 1[^Activity] gives you [^Energy] instead of [^Science] or [^Parts]
Items.Flavor: Let’s make sure this planned energy crisis leaves us on top

Items.Name: Temporal Energy Stream
Items.Text: This is worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every 2[^ChronoMatter] spent on [^Activity] that gain [^Energy]
Items.Flavor: We can now use energy from other points in time without disrupting their power supply

Items.Name: Linch Pin Program
Items.Text:
[^Trigger][[WingDings3 u]] Do a [^Past] [^Activity]
[^Effect][[WingDings3 u]] Lose 2[^Money] and gain 1[^VictoryPoint] for each [^ChronoMatter] cost on that [^Activity]

[^Overclock] 4[[WingDings3 u]] 1[^Activity] counts as a [^Past] [^Activity]
Items.Flavor: It's like dominoes, just watch as my plan unfolds

Items.Name: Time Museum
Items.Text: Worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every 2[^ChronoMatter] on your [^Past] [^Activity]
Items.Flavor: The key to the Future is the Past

Items.Name: Philanthropist Clone
Items.Text:
[^Trigger][[WingDings3 u]] Do a [^Present] [^Activity]
[^Effect][[WingDings3 u]] Lose 3[^Money] and gain 1[^VictoryPoint] for each [^ChronoMatter] cost on that [^Activity]

[^Overclock] 1[[WingDings3 u]] 1[^Activity] counts as a [^Present] [^Activity]
Items.Flavor: How does he have time to come to all these charity events, and run a lab?

Items.Name: Illuminati Device
Items.Text: Worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every 2[^ChronoMatter] on your [^Present] [^Activity]
Items.Flavor: Pulling the strings...

Items.Name: Holopark
Items.Text:
[^Trigger][[WingDings3 u]] Do a [^Future] [^Activity]
[^Effect][[WingDings3 u]] Lose 4[^Money] and gain 1[^VictoryPoint] for each [^ChronoMatter] cost on that [^Activity]

[^Overclock] 1[[WingDings3 u]] 1[^Activity] counts as a [^Future] [^Activity]
Items.Flavor: Come and enjoy the Future today at Holopark

Items.Name: Tech Stealing Device
Items.Text: Worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every 2[^ChronoMatter] on your [^Future] [^Activity]
Items.Flavor: It’s hard to prove this was someone else’s tech when I clearly invented it first

Items.Name: Direction Heat Satellite
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Money], gain 3[^Good]

[^Overclock] 2[[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Good]
Items.Flavor: Providing Heat to those who need it the most

Items.Name: Death Detection Satellite
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Science], gain 3[^Good]

[^Overclock] 2[[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Good]
Items.Flavor: With this, we can detect if people are harmed across the world, and hopefully save them

Items.Name: Robotic Mental Link
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Parts], gain 3[^Good]

[^Overclock] 2[[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Good]
Items.Flavor: Imagine if you had a group of robots that responded to your thoughts

Items.Name: Energy Backup Grid
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Energy], gain 3[^Good]

[^Overclock] 2[[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Good]
Items.Flavor: In case of emergency

Items.Name: Chaos Realm Portal
Items.Text:
[[BoldText End of Game]][[WingDings3 u]] Roll dice equal to number of [[BoldText Chaos]] inventions you own 
This is worth [^VictoryPoint] equal to the result of the dice
1: -1    2: 0   3: 1
4: 2   5: 3   6: 4
Items.Flavor: I harness the energies of the Chaos Realm itself

Items.Name: Overclocker
Items.Text:
Worth 1[^VictoryPoint] for each [^Overclock] invention you have

[^Overclock] 1[[WingDings3 u]] For each invention you [^Overclock] this turn, you may pay 4[^Money] and gain 1[^VictoryPoint]
Items.Flavor: You have no idea how powerful my inventions are, time for MAXIMUM POWER!

Items.Name: Critical Breakthrough Device
Items.Text:
When invented search the Breakthrough deck for any Breakthrough and gain or upgrade it paying its associated cost

Worth 1[^VictoryPoint] for every Breakthrough you have
Items.Flavor: This is just the breakthrough I needed

Items.Name: Modded Reality
Items.Text:
When invented search the [^Mod] deck for any [^Mod] and gain or upgrade it paying its associated cost

Worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every [^Mod] you have
Items.Flavor: Reality is what you mod it to be

Items.Name: Elite Inventor's Guild
Items.Text: This is worth [^VictoryPoint] equal to a different owned invention's core resource cost of your choice
Items.Flavor: Only the best inventions!

Items.Name: Elitist Scientific Community
Items.Text: This is worth 1 less [^VictoryPoint] for each invention you own
Items.Flavor: One of those closed portal communities

Items.Name: Rube Goldberg Machine
Items.Text: Worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for each Rube Goldburg Machine you own including this one
Items.Flavor: ...The hurricane will travel near here…

Items.Name: Rube Goldberg Machine
Items.Text: Worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for each Rube Goldburg Machine you own including this one
Items.Flavor: ...And then the hurricane will blow a butterfly…

Items.Name: Amaz-i-tron 5000
Items.Text: When invented, gain 5[^Good]
Items.Flavor: This invention is so wanted I have already stopped numerous thieves attempts

Items.Name: Enhanced Form
Items.Text: Worth 1 addtional [^VictoryPoint] for every [^Biotech] invention you own
Items.Flavor: Behold! My true form!

Items.Name: Pocket Dimension
Items.Text: Worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every [^Dimensional] invention you own
Items.Flavor: My own private dimension

Items.Name: Dark Phasing Castle
Items.Text: Worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every [^DarkMatter] invention you own
Items.Flavor: No one knows how to find the castle, it appears and vanishes in an instant

Items.Name: Robotic City
Items.Text: Worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every [^Robotic] invention you own
Items.Flavor: Every building, every artificial tree is a robot in this town

Items.Name: Elite Space Station
Items.Text: Worth 2 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every [^Yellow] invention you own
Items.Flavor: Where the richest individuals live

Items.Name: Invisible-ite
Items.Text: Worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every [^Red] invention you own
Items.Flavor: This new material is strong and is virtually undetectable

Items.Name: Personal Megacorp
Items.Text: Worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every [^Purple] invention you own
Items.Flavor: I’m like all the other megacorps except I’m the only employee

Items.Name: Universal Translator
Items.Text: Worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every pair of [^Green] inventions you own
Items.Flavor: Have you ever wondered what your pet was trying to communicate?

Items.Name: Rainbow Showcase
Items.Text: Worth 3 additional [^VictoryPoint] for each set of all 4 color inventions you have invented
Items.Flavor: To bedazzle and impress!

Items.Name: Invention Emporium
Items.Text: Worth 3 additional [^VictoryPoint] for each set of all 4 types of inventions you have invented
Items.Flavor: Take a look around my vast collection

Items.Name: Optimized Time Machine
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Gain [^ChronoMatter] equal to the number of [[BoldText Chrono]] inventions you have

This is worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every [^ChronoMatter] you have at the end of the game
Items.Flavor: Traveling through time at a fraction of the cost

Items.Name: Company Buyout Program
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 5[^Money] for each [[BoldText Money]] Invention you have

This is worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every 5[^Money] you have
Items.Flavor: I own a good percentage of all companies under various shell corporations

Items.Name: Ultimate Analyzer Satellite
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Science] equal to the number of [[BoldText Science]] inventions you own

This is worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every [^Science] you have
Items.Flavor: The more data I feed, the more that satellite can analyze everything going on

Items.Name: Robotic Building Microbots
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Parts] equal to the number of [[BoldText Parts]] inventions you own

This is worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every [^Parts] you have
Items.Flavor: Who needs walls when you can have tiny robots BE the walls!

Items.Name: Infinite Power Exploit Device
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Energy] equal to the number of [[BoldText Energy]] inventions you own

This is worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every [^Energy] you have
Items.Flavor: Before time travel, there was no way to change the amount of energy in the universe

Items.Name: Market Monopoly AI
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] For every 3 [[BoldText Mixed]] inventions you own gain 1[^Science], [^Parts], [^Energy], and [^Money]

This is worth 3 additional [^VictoryPoint] for each set of 1[^Money], [^Science], [^Parts], and [^Energy] you have
Items.Flavor: Whoever controls the supply controls all the consumers

Items.Name: Automated Future
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 11[^Money] - 1 for every [^Produce] invention you own to gain 3[^VictoryPoint]

Worth 1[^VictoryPoint] for every [^Produce] invention you own
Items.Flavor: No one has to work anymore, people only work if they want to

Items.Name: Mimic Machine
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Ready another Activate invention

Worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for each Activate invention you own
Items.Flavor: It’s what I need it to be

Items.Name: Adaptive Careful AI
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Every [^Progress] invention gains 1[^Progress]
[^Trigger][[WingDings3 u]] A [^Progress] power is activated
[^Effect][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Progress]
[^Progress] 4[[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^VictoryPoint],

This is worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for each [^Progress] invention
Items.Flavor: Watching your back

Items.Name: World Freedom Program
Items.Text:
When invented, gain 3[^Good]
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] For every [^Good] invention you own pay 2[^Money] and gain 1[^Good]
Items.Flavor: Ensuring freedom to all, with exceptions of course

Items.Name: World Domination Program
Items.Text:
When invented, gain 3[^Evil]

This is worth 2 additional [^VictoryPoint] for each [^Evil] invention you own
Items.Flavor: My ultimate goal? World domination of course!

Items.Name: Library Implant
Items.Text:
At the start of [[BoldText Draft]] phase, draw 4 inventions that are not considered to be [[BoldText drafted]]
During [[BoldText invent]] phase you may [[BoldText invent]] one of those inventions
Items.Flavor: I access a whole library with this implant

Items.Name: Dimensional Back Door
Items.Text:
[^Overclock] 1[[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^Evil] and choose one to gain: 
20[^Money], 4[^Science], 4[^Parts], or 4[^Energy]
Items.Flavor: Sometime you just need the resources, and it doesn't matter how much backlash there is

Items.Name: Chrono Field
Items.Text:
At the start of [[BoldText Act]] Phase draw 2[^Activity]
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Money] and 1[^Energy], gain 2[^ChronoMatter]
Items.Flavor: We are exploring time

Items.Name: Open Universe
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Science] and 1[^Parts], gain 2[^Progress]
[^Progress][[WingDings3 u]] [[ChargeText 6_[[WingDings3 u]]_Choose 2 different]] 9 | Choose 1 different
3[^ChronoMatter], 5[^Science], 5[^Parts], or 5[^Energy],
Also D & R 2 [^Breakthrough], 2 [^Mod], and 2[^Activity]
[^Overclock] 2[[WingDings3 u]] gain 1[^Progress]
Items.Flavor:
Unlocking the keys of the universe
It is all in the set up

Items.Name: Paradox Exploiter
Items.Text:
At the start of [[BoldText Act]] phase draw 2 less [^Activity]
Gain 3[^Money] for each [^ChronoMatter] you turn into other resources
Items.Flavor: We unlock the true potental of paradoxes

Items.Name: Critical Theory
Items.Text: Before [[BoldText Invent]] phase of stage 1, search the Breakthrough deck for any Breakthrough and gain it paying its associated cost
Items.Flavor: I have a plan that requires an all in approach

Items.Name: Mass Producer
Items.Text:
During your first [^Produce] phase, select a core resource and add that resource Tag to this invention
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Lose 5[^Money], gain 3 of the selected resource
Items.Flavor: Our lab has a distinct advantage, we double as a hi-tech production center

Items.Name: Experimention Chamber
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Choose one you haven't picked before:
1. D & R 4 [^Breakthrough]
2. D & R 4 [^Mod]
3. D & R 4[^Activity]
4. You start with one additional card in your pack and you must choose an additional card for your first pick
Items.Flavor: Progress requires experimentation
